content: I'm currently trying to figure out what variants of ConstKind can even show up in mir::Constant. While Param can show up, is it really necessary? I think we could just use Unevaluated there. The only place these show up is for mir::Operand, which can't possibly affect the type system beyond the type of the constant
yeah, theoretically values and unevaluated is enough
or hmm, not sure how exactly that works
